attributes.action: Put speed bumps on Huntingdon Road in Chatteris
attributes.additional_details: Having speed bumps on Huntingdon Road, towards the roundabout leading to Huntingdon on the A141, should be a huge priority. Drivers persistently speed along this road despite there being a park nearby and thus a high possibility of children and/or dogs going onto the road and being in danger of the speeding cars!
